RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 49. Claiming Purse 17800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000 In Last 5 Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEQUILA FLATS tracked leaders to the turn, rallied all out in the stretch to get,up. MIXTER JENSEN pressed to turn, took over into the stretch, could not last. SWING STATE good position never far back to the stretch, slow grind too late. WHISKEY HELPS raced along evenly with no late response when needed. JIM'S RIVER RUNNER broke tardy, rushed inside to the front, stopped into the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Jim's River Runner
ENTRY.OWNER: Rankin Elizabeth Lavrich Nancy and Rankin Lindsey
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy, rushed inside to the front, stopped into the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Swing State
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back to the stretch, slow grind too late

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Helps
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Tequila Flats
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders to the turn, rallied all out in the stretch,up

ENTRY.NAME: Mixter Jensen
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed to turn, took over into the stretch, could not last

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Regist ered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BELIEVING sprinted to the front, well handled throughout to stay clear in the late going. WINWARD FLO chased winner throughout to no avail, no match best of rest. MY ANGELICA raced along evenly with no late response when needed. SUPER LUCY omce paced from inside, lacked a response in the stretch run. HIGH MEADOWS never a menace throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Super Lucy
ENTRY.COMMENT: omce paced from inside, lacked a response in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Winward Flo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout to no avail, no match best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: My Angelica
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no late response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Believing
ENTRY.OWNER: Kuntz Mark D and Dalton Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted to the front, well handled throughout, stayed clear late

ENTRY.NAME: High Meadows
ENTRY.COMMENT: never a menace throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER IN 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 17, 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIRJUS DREAM tracked leaderes to the turn, roused three wide, blew past and edged clear under good handling to the wire. QUICKY DESIRE pinched between horses early on, lagged back, rallied late. JILL BABE inside run to the front, led to quarter pole outbid for place. DESTINY'S DARLING pressured leader to the turn, could not go on and faded late. YOGURT always trailed and never threatened.

ENTRY.NAME: Jill Babe
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to the front, led to quarter pole outbid for place

ENTRY.NAME: Quicky Desire
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched between horses early on, lagged back, rallied late

ENTRY.NAME: Yogurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed and never threatened

ENTRY.NAME: Destiny's Darling
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressured leader to the turn, could not go on and faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Sirjus Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaderes to the turn, roused three wide, blew past clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 97. Starter Allowance Purse 17900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since April 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allo wed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500 In Last 5 Starts)(Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COME SEE ABOUT IT tracked pacesetter to far turn, roused to go clear into the stretch under good handling to the wire. OUT WORK'N good speed to the front, overtaken while no match, best of rest. HIGH HEATER raced along evenly with no late response when needed late. HAGLER tried to keep up from inside to no avail fro far turn. SCAT SHACK always trailed.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT DAME tracking leader to far turn, roused to go past, held sway while drifting in te late going. FORGLO never far back from off rail to far turn, ran on late no match. BELLE OF ST. JOHN unhurried to far turn outside, ran on to just miss place spot. SUM KINDA PRETTY good position behind leaders to the half, could not go on late. TALK RADIO raced along evenly throughout with no late response when needed. LIVE IT UP inside quick speed to the front, stayed to the half, gave way.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 51. Maiden Special Weight Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIZZEN THE POINT just off leader to the turn, took over to quarter pole stayed on. PRICELESS PICTURE drive to the turn, rallied along in the stretch best of rest. OHIO LADY dueled early on, chased to stretch, weakened final furlong. PRONTO CHARLI inside run to the stretch while saving all the ground to no avail. SISSY'S MAY broke tardy, never in contention throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early on, chased to stretch, weakened final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Mizzen the Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leader to the turn, took over to quarter pole stayed on

ENTRY.NAME: Sissy's May
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy, never in contention throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Priceless Picture
ENTRY.COMMENT: drive to the turn, rallied along in the stretch best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Pronto Charli
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to the stretch while saving all the ground to no avail

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 80. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 17 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NANA'S GRAY sprinted clear in turn, maintained clear advantage to the stretch while ridden out to the wire. ERV'S WENCH broke tardy, ran up on heels at the three eighths pole turn, angled out, rallied along while no match. SEAWARD good position never far back throughout, ran on evenly for show. WHISKEY SIS chased top pair to the turn, could not stay on in the stretch. KAIYAS SONG could not keep up to turn, folded into the stretch. EIDA'S STORM never menaced. FUTURE FLAY flashed brief speed, stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Erv's Wench
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke tardy, on heels turn, rallied along while no match

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sis
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to the turn, could not stay on in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Kaiyas Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: could not keep up to turn, folded into the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Future Flay
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed brief speed, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Seaward
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position never far back throughout, ran on evenly for show

ENTRY.NAME: Eida's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Nana's Gray
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear in turn, maintained clear advantage ridden out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 71. Allowance Purse 27100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since April 17, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $17,500 Or Le ss Not Considered In Allowances) (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIMON SAYS rushed to the front between horses, led each call, cleared. CHIEF BUCKEYE broke flat-footed from the gate, regrouped quickly, saved ground to the turn, angled out for the stretch run while all out for place spot in a good effort. OL' NED off rail position throughout, ran on evenly in stretch for show. SERENDIPITOUS tried to keep up outside to turn, never a real menace. THE PINK Z brief speed from inside, could not keep up and faded back inside. JUST TAPIT IN awkward from the gate outside, always far back. STUNT MAN through early, faded back readily.

ENTRY.NAME: The Pink Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed from inside, could not keep up and faded back inside

ENTRY.NAME: Simon Says
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to the front between horses, led each call, cleared

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Hal Snowden Jr., Cathy H. Comley & Calumet Farm

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Buckeye
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke flat-footed, regrouped all out in the stretch run for place

ENTRY.NAME: Ol' Ned
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail position throughout, ran on evenly in stretch for show

ENTRY.NAME: Stunt Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, faded back readily

ENTRY.NAME: Serendipitous
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up outside to turn, never a real menace

ENTRY.NAME: Just Tapit In
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward from the gate outside, always far back
